full_summary:
**Title:** Snow Removal and Ice Control, Debert Area, Canadian Forces Base Halifax, Nova Scotia

**Reference number and Amendment:** Reference number MX-42877558689, amendment number 4

**SOLICITATION NUMBER AND ISSUE DATE** : Solicitation number HX591816_80021 was issued on September 28, 2023.

**CLOSING DATE AND TIME:** Tenders are invited to close on November 14, 2023 at 13:00

**EXPECTED CONTRACT DURATION:** The contract will run from November 22, 2023 to April 30, 2024. 

**OPTIONAL PERIODS:** The contract includes the option to extend for two (2) additional one-year periods from November 1, 2024 to April 30, 2025 and then from November 1, 2025 to April 30, 2026

**PROJECT DESCRIPTION:** Snow removal and ice control services at various sites, including Truro Armouries, Debert Rifle Range, Great Village Site, Masstown Site, Pictou Armoury, Springhill Armoury, and Amherst Armour.

**WORK SCOPE:** The scope of work includes all the necessary labour, materials, equipment, and supervision required for snow removal and ice control services.

**ESTIMATED CONTRACT VALUE** : The estimated total value of the contract is $885,600.00, comprising an initial estimated value of $295,200.00 and two optional periods of $295,200.00 each.

**Security Clearance:**

 Contractors must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS), issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

**SOLICITATION HOW TO PARTICIPATE:** Bidders can submit their tender online at http://www.merx.com. Details on pricing can be found on the MERX website.

**ENQUIRIES:**

Bidders are required to address all their questions directly to the point of contact, Veronica Mendoza, veronica.mendoza@dcc-cdc.gc.ca, 902-943-1204.

**POST-TENDER RESULTS:**

The preliminary tender results for this project will be available on MERX. Contract award results will be available on the Defence Construction Canada website at https://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca/industry/contract-activity.
